wikipedia_page.main:
Kieran Dixon (born 22 August 1992) is an English professional rugby league footballer who plays as winger or fullback for the Leigh Centurions in the Betfred Championship and the England Knights at international level.
He has played for the London Broncos in the Super League and in the Championship, and on loan from the Broncos at the Hemel Stags in League 1. He also played for Hull Kingston Rovers in the Super League.
